results.title: The Impact of Metformin Use with Survival Outcomes in Urologic Cancers: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: The Impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Use with Survival Outcomes in @<m>DISEASE_Urologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014571 @@@Urologic Cancers@@@: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis

results.title: New insight in urological cancer therapy: From epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT) to application of nano-biomaterials.
results.text_hl: Moreover, anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ compounds such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be utilized in suppressing @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@malignancy of@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Urologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014571 @@@urological tumors@@@.

results.title: Potential role for metformin in urologic oncology
results.text_hl: These studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ does have a future role in the prevention and management of @<m>DISEASE_Urologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014571 @@@urologic malignancies@@@.

citations.NLM: Sayyid RK, Fleshner NE. Potential role for metformin in urologic oncology Investig Clin Urol. 2016 May;57(3):157-64. PMID: 27195314
citations.BibTeX: @article{27195314, title={Potential role for metformin in urologic oncology}, author={Sayyid RK and Fleshner NE}, journal={Investig Clin Urol}, volume={57}, number={3}, pages={157-64}}

results.title: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2: A Driving Force for Urological Complications.
results.text_hl: Previously unknown associations between @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and risk for @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@renal cell carcinomas@@@, @DISEASE_Urinary_Tract_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D014552 @@@urinary tract infections@@@, @DISEASE_Nephrolithiasis @DISEASE_MESH:D053040 @@@nephrolithiasis@@@, @DISEASE_Penile_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010409 @@@penile lesions@@@, @DISEASE_Virilism @DISEASE_MESH:D014770 @@@androgen deficiency@@@, and @DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@ have been discovered. Significantly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could play a role in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Urologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014571 @@@urological malignancies@@@, and therapies used for management of these @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@ could in return lead to increased risk for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Sayyid RK, Fleshner NE. Diabetes Mellitus Type 2: A Driving Force for Urological Complications. Trends Endocrinol Metab. 2016 May;27(5):249-261. PMID: 26969242
